title: YIGOLI Energy Arm
description: Robotic arm that automates vehicle refueling using advanced 3D imaging and AI for precise fuel cap handling.
fullDescription: The YIGOLI Energy Arm is an innovative robotic system designed to automate the vehicle refueling process. Utilizing 3D stereoscopic imaging and laser radar, it accurately identifies and opens fuel caps, inserts the nozzle, and refuels vehicles without human intervention. This cutting-edge technology enhances efficiency and safety at fueling stations while providing a seamless experience for drivers. The system represents a significant advancement in automotive service automation, combining precision robotics with intelligent recognition systems to revolutionize traditional gas station operations.

specifications.Imaging System: 3D stereoscopic imaging and laser radar for precise vehicle identification
specifications.Recognition Technology: Advanced AI algorithms for fuel cap identification and positioning
specifications.Precision: High-accuracy robotic arm with multiple degrees of freedom
specifications.Operation Mode: Fully automated refueling process without human intervention
specifications.Safety Features: Multiple safety sensors and emergency stop mechanisms
specifications.Compatibility: Designed to work with various vehicle types and fuel cap designs
specifications.Weather Resistance: All-weather operation capability for outdoor installations
specifications.Processing Speed: Real-time image processing and decision making

capabilities: Automated Fuel Cap Recognition: Uses 3D imaging to identify and locate fuel caps on various vehicle models
Precise Robotic Manipulation: Accurately opens fuel caps and inserts nozzles with mechanical precision
Intelligent Navigation: Advanced AI guidance system for optimal positioning and movement
Safety Monitoring: Continuous monitoring of the refueling process with automatic error detection
Vehicle Compatibility: Adapts to different vehicle heights, fuel cap positions, and access requirements
applications: Fueling Stations: Automating the refueling process for enhanced efficiency and reduced wait times
Fleet Management: Streamlining refueling operations for large vehicle fleets and logistics companies
Highway Service Centers: Providing automated fueling services for long-distance travelers
Commercial Depots: Automated refueling for delivery trucks, buses, and commercial vehicles
Smart Cities: Integration into intelligent transportation infrastructure for autonomous vehicle support
